column1: Little Goat Diner////I've got the same complaints about Little Goat as I do Girl and the Goat
column2: only distilled into a trendy casual diner setting. Namely
column3: Stephanie Izard's growing empire relies way too heavily on salt as a flavor instead of flavor as a flavor. Further
column4: service is very spotty. And if you've ever loved spending $8 on bread
column6: do I have the place for you.
